nodes.text: Danna was a male smuggler who owned a starship with his female partner, Gabriel. During the Galactic Civil War, they were hauling denta beans to Gyndine. During a stopover, Gabriel met a former smuggling associate who sold her that month's codes to access Cynabar's InfoNet. She attempted to convince Danna to reroute to Lan Barell, dump the denta beans for lommite, and pay off their outstanding amount on the ship in one go.
